events.name: Continuous Delivery Night
events.description: Hi We're organizing next meetup after the lunar year celebration with an event about Continuous Delivery and Lean Development. == Flavio Monigatti - Lean DevelopmentFlavio is a key person in the DevOps ecosystem for Credit Suisse. In order to be able to stay competitive in todays’ challenging market environment it is key to be able to innovate at speed. The concepts of lean development help to position dev teams to achieve the same. == Sergiu Bodiu - Continuous Delivery why everyone should do itCan you release new features to your customers every week? Every day? Every hour? Do new developers deploy code on their first day, or even during job interviews? Can you sleep soundly after a new hire’s deployment knowing your applications are all running fine? Keep Calm and Push Apps-aaS!
events.location: PayPal office in Suntec, 5 Temasek Blvd, #09-01 Suntec Tower Five, 038985 Nearest Mrt:Promenade(Yellow Line), Singapore

events.name: Usability Testing -  The Foundation
events.description: A workshop for the foundation of Usability Testing .  Agenda: • 15min: Networking. • 30min: Mini-talk on Usability Testing. • 5min: Challenge review. • 30min: In pair, learn to do usability testing. • 20min: Discussion. • 5min: Wrapping up.
events.location: Rakuten Crimson House, 138 Market Street, Lvl 32, CapitaGreen, 048946, Singapore

events.name: Gophers meetup - Feb 2016
events.description: Let's kick off this year with a lot of energy and motivation to learn more about Golang. Coincidentally, Go version 1.6 will be released around this time too. Let's celebrate this release and discuss what's new. Agenda:-  "Queueing with Go -- FIFO through RoundRobin and beyond" by Loh Siu Yin-  Stats and graphs on go and the developer com by Sayanee Basu-  "Dashing Go" by Chris Heng - "The State of Go" by Dan Tran. If you have any project or talk to share, please don't hesitate to contact us at  sg.gopher@gmail.com . We are looking for both advance technical and lightening talks.
